subject: Baseball
World Baseball Classic
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Geovany Soto, an All-Star for the Chicago Cubs and one of the best young catchers in baseball, will suit up this weekend for Puerto Rico in the World Baseball Classic.
snippet: Geovany Soto, an All-Star for the Chicago Cubs and one of the best young catchers in baseball, will suit up this weekend for Puerto Rico in the World Baseball Classic.
